name: Kailash Hanwat
content: Himanshu demonstrates a caring attitude and actively contributes to multiple projects, technical development, and enhancement sprints. He takes full ownership of tasks and consistently delivers effective, well-structured solutions. His demos are impactful and he stands out as a skilled NetSuite technical consultant.

name: Paramjit Singh
content: Himanshu shows excellent techno-functional versatility across NetSuite and Oracle Cloud. He has led multiple data migrations end-to-end with zero downtime, delivered consistently high-quality work, and received strong client feedback. His certifications and Autothon 2.0 win highlight his dedication and innovation.

name: Paramjit Singh
content: Himanshu demonstrated strong SQL expertise, solved urgent issues efficiently, and contributed significantly to project outcomes. His technical versatility in SuiteScript, PDF customization, and integrations enhanced client delivery. His drive for self-learning and growth is commendable.

name: Paramjit Singh
content: Himanshu built strong capabilities in SQL, troubleshooting, and data modeling while delivering insightful reports that supported business decision-making. His structured thinking and ability to prevent issues through systematic analysis stand out.

name: Paramjit Singh
content: Himanshu showed impressive initiative in learning Python, AI, DialogFlow, Generative AI, and Oracle APEX. His proactive approach and hands-on curiosity allowed him to build practical solutions, demonstrating strong potential and dedication.

name: Paramjit Singh
content: Himanshu is hardworking, punctual, and takes strong ownership of responsibilities. He proactively provides updates, collaborates well with the team, and consistently meets expectations while continuing to expand his technical abilities.
